function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential airborne transmission of SARS-CoV-2 in indoor environments due to inadequate ventilation and overcrowding","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne infection and potential spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Increase ventilation rates, prevent air recirculation, use portable air cleaners, and avoid overcrowding","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, portable air cleaners","People":"Building administrators, infection control teams, residents","Owner":"Building administrators, infection control teams"},{"Description":"Lack of awareness or emphasis on the effectiveness of engineering controls for reducing airborne infection risks","Impact":"Failure to effectively control and reduce airborne infection risks, leading to potential spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Inform and emphasize the effectiveness of engineering controls to building administrators and infection control teams","Technologies":"Education and training on engineering controls","People":"Building administrators, infection control teams","Owner":"Health authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and air stagnation in confined spaces with high patient exhaled airborne viral loads","Impact":"Increased risk of infection transmission in confined spaces and potential spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Supplement existing ventilation with portable air cleaners and avoid overcrowding","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, portable air cleaners","People":"Healthcare personnel, patients","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, infection control teams"}]}
